00781         // Multiply intime factor
00782         //localCopy = (*this) * time;
00783         localCopy.multiply(time);
00784 
00785         // Setup Pade coefficients
00786         padeCoef.element(0) = 1;
00787         for (i = 1; i <= nCoefs; i++) {
00788                 k = i;
00789                 padeCoef.element(i) = padeCoef.element(i-1) * ((nCoefs+1-k)/(k*(2*nCoefs+1-k)));
00790         }
00791 
00792         // Scale the matrix if necessary
00793         scaleFactor = m_thisMatrix->infinityNorm();
00794         if (scaleFactor > 0.5) {
00795 
00796                 scaleFactor = log(scaleFactor)/log((double)2);
00797                 scaleFactor = (scaleFactor > 0) ? floor(scaleFactor) : ceil(scaleFactor);
00798                 scaleFactor += 2;
00799                 scaleFactor = (scaleFactor > 0) ? scaleFactor : 0;
00800 
00801                 localCopy = pow((double)2,-scaleFactor) * localCopy;
00802         }
00803 
00804         // Horner evaluation of the irreducible fraction
00805         I.identity();
00806         squaredCopy = localCopy * localCopy;
00807         Q = padeCoef.element(nCoefs) * I;
00808         P = padeCoef.element(nCoefs-1) * I;
00809         odd = 1;
00810 
00811         for (i = (nCoefs - 1); i > 0; i--) {
00812 
00813                 if (odd == 1) {
00814                         Q = Q*squaredCopy + padeCoef.element(i-1)*I;
00815                 } else {
00816                         P = P*squaredCopy + padeCoef.element(i-1)*I;
00817                 }
00818 
00819                 odd = 1 - odd;
00820         }
00821 
00822         if (odd == 1) {
00823                 Q = Q*localCopy;
00824                 Q = Q - P;
00825                 result = -1*(I + 2 * (Q.inverse() * P));
00826         } else {
00827                 P = P*localCopy;
00828                 Q = Q - P;
00829                 result = I + 2 * (Q.inverse() * P);
00830         }
00831 
00832         // Squaring
00833         for (i = 0; i < (unsigned int)scaleFactor; i++) {
00834 
00835                 result = result * result;
00836         }
00837 
00838         return result;
00839 }
